init def __init__(self, driver, url): self.driver = driver self.url = url # open def open(self): self.driver.get(self.url) # locator def locator(self, loc): return self.driver.find_element(*loc) # quit def quit(self): self.driver.quit() 2. login_page.pyå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š å¯¹è±¡é¡µé¢å…¶å®ä¹Ÿå°±åªéœ€å†™ä¸¤ä¸ªå†…å®¹ï¼Œè·å–å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç„¶åå°è£…å…ƒç´ çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ“ä½œï¼šå…ˆå®šä½ï¼Œç„¶åå†ç”¨seleniumçš„å…ƒç´ æ“ä½œsend_keysã€clickç­‰ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425from selenium.webdriver.common.by import Byfrom base_page.base import BasePage''' åœ¨è¿™é‡Œä¸»è¦å†™ç™»é™†é¡µé¢ï¼Œæ€è·¯å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š 1ã€æ‰¾åˆ°å…ƒç´  2ã€ç„¶åå…ƒç´ æ“ä½œå°è£…'''class LoginPage(BasePage): url = 'http://39.98.138.157/shopxo/index.php?s=/index/user/logininfo.html' username = (By.XPATH, '/html/body/div[4]/div/div[2]/div[2]/form/div[1]/input') password = (By.XPATH, '/html/body/div[4]/div/div[2]/div[2]/form/div[2]/input') login_btn = (By.XPATH, '/html/body/div[4]/div/div[2]/div[2]/form/div[3]/button') def input_username(self, un): self.locator(self.username).send_keys(un) def input_password(self, pwd): self.locator(self.password).send_keys(pwd) def click_login(self): self.locator(self.login_btn).click() 3. posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
